[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Hero Section” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#1865e0″ background_color_gradient_end=”#ffffff” background_color_gradient_direction=”72deg” custom_padding=”70px|0px|70px|0px”][et_pb_row padding_top_1=”60px” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.83″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.0.89″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”Poppins||||||||” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”56px” header_line_height=”1.3em” width=”100%” custom_padding=”|0px||||” animation_style=”fade”]

MD’S MESSAGE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Poppins||||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.8)” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”100ms”]

 

“PROTECT MIGRATE RIGHTS, PROVIDE DECENT WORKS, PROMOTE EMPLOYMENT OF ORIGIN COUNTRY  AND SUPPORT PRODUCTIVITY & ECONOMIC GROWTH OF RECEIVING COUNTRY”.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.83″][et_pb_image src=”https://www.recruitmentmyanmarsak.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/saklogo-copy.png” align_tablet=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ width=”90.3%” custom_padding=”|||||” animation_style=”fade”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_team_member name=”Su Su Mon” position=”Managing Director” image_url=”https://www.recruitmentmyanmarsak.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/WhatsApp-Image-2019-08-27-at-11.08-1.jpg” facebook_url=”#” twitter_url=”#” google_url=”#” linkedin_url=”#” admin_label=”Member 01″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″ header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”22px” header_line_height=”2em” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”#666666″ body_font_size=”16px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”|70px||||” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”][/et_pb_team_member][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.24.1″ custom_padding=”|||0px||”]

Having a stable job and income is vital for each and every individual. Being an entrepreneur, I strongly belief that we should “protect migrant rights, provide decent works, promote employment of origin country and support productivity and economic growth of receiving country. 

As the Managing Director of Saint Arkar Employment Agency, I have the opportunity to work with dynamic, young and dedicated team, who share the common mission of providing better jobs for workers in Myanmar and providing the best quality services to our clients(employers). It is such an honor to be able to contribute to such a worthy mission.

We are also committed to ensure that we comply our explicit, clear and transparent, ethical recruitment policy that enable us to demonstrate our commitment to core principles of “Integrity, Respect, Collaboration, Empowerment and Responsibility” and the highest principles of professionalism, fair practices and ethics in dealing with our clients(employers), workers, our employee and other business associates.

We also adhere to applicable labour laws, regulations and code of conducts, and we do not involve in any recruitment or employment processes which are illegal or harmful to migrant workers.

Me and my team value our partners who have chosen our services and we look forward to establishing long-term business relationship. We always welcome and invite everyone who wish to work hand in hand with us and we assure our client’s satisfaction and best services.

Thank you so much for your support and look forward to connecting with you in the near future!

Su Su Mon
Managing Director

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Email Subscribe” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#0c71c3″ background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(73,108,220,0.93)” custom_padding=”90px||60px|” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”4%”][et_pb_row background_position_1=”top_left” background_repeat_1=”no-repeat” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_width_px=”710px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.2″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” max_width=”100px” module_alignment=”center” height=”5px” custom_margin=”||20px|” custom_padding=”||20px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Request Section Title” _builder_version=”3.0.78″ header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_font_size=”36px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

Keep in Touch

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Request Section Subtitle” _builder_version=”3.0.78″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

If you have any queries about recruitments, vacancies, or anything else, our team is ready to response all your queries.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Footer” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_image=”https://www.recruitmentmyanmarsak.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/business-01.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”90px||90px|” saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ custom_padding=”|||” make_equal=”on” background_color_1=”#ffffff” background_color_2=”#ffffff” background_position_1=”top_left” background_position_2=”top_left” background_repeat_1=”no-repeat” background_repeat_2=”no-repeat” padding_top_1=”50px” padding_top_2=”50px” padding_right_1=”40px” padding_right_2=”40px” padding_bottom_1=”50px” padding_bottom_2=”50px” padding_left_1=”40px” padding_left_2=”40px” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Contact US Title” _builder_version=”3.0.78″ text_font_size=”16px” header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”22px” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

Reach Us

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%249%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ icon_placement=”left” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”28px” icon_font_size_last_edited=”off|desktop” admin_label=”Address” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ body_font_size=”16px” custom_margin=”|||” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]
